channel.title: PerfectlySoft JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ISS-183] Swift build Error
item.description:
Hi

I use Perfect-master from github

when I use swift build It tell me more errors about that
Compile Swift Module 'PerfectLib' (36 sources)
/home/parallels/Downloads/Perfect-master/Sources/PerfectLib/JSONConvertible.swift:44:50: error: missing argument label 'name:' in call
return JSONDecoding.createJSONConvertibleObject(objkey, values: values)
^
name:

^

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Ok I change Swift 3.0 March version everything is ok !! Thx
